tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
quoteText: On our Website or in the Software, we may utilize services available to us (such as Google Maps, Twitter, Disqus, Facebook, Philips Hue, and email providers), and we may partner or work with third party services (such as lighting controls, fitness, geolocation providers, or home automation companies) to offer you certain features in connection with the Software, and such third party services may collect information from our users.
